Detailed Description

template<typename ALLOC = std::allocator<uint8_t>>
class zserio::BlobBuffer< ALLOC >

Implementation of IBlobBuffer interface.

Member Function Documentation

template<typename ALLOC = std::allocator<uint8_t>>
virtual Span<uint8_t> zserio::BlobBuffer< ALLOC >::data ( )
inlineoverridevirtual

Get the blob data span.

Returns
Span representing the blob data. The returned blob is valid until the instance of the Blob is destroyed or until the resize method is called.

Implements zserio::IBlobBuffer.
